title.content-text: 8.4.5 - Configuring ACL's with Inter-V LAN Routing

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the use of V LAN's to separate network devices.

Network Topology
There are two V LAN's. V LAN1 contains three servers, and V LAN2 contains three hosts. Both V LAN's are connected through a switch, S1, which is connected to a router, R1.
